Summary: Went outside - observed triangle shaped UFO hovering over the house. Lights along sides - no sound at all. Moved away slowly after 30 minutes
divs: Sighting DetailsAbout 8:00 pm I stepped outside into my front yard. When I turned to return to the house I saw a UFO hovering about 50 feet over the house. It was very close. It appeared to be black and triangular in shape with lights along the sides. It made no sound whatsoever and did't move at all. We lived near Barksdale AFB so I went in to phone the base to see if anyone else had reported this. No one had and the base said they didn't have any aircraft in the area. I returned to the yard and it was still there. The wife and I watched it for about 30 minutes until it slowly moved westward until it was out of sight. It was much too close to be mistaken for anything else. The strange thing was that there was not a sound or a breeze or a movement at all.
